The Utah Jazz The Utah Jazz shot extremely well , going 53 percent from the field and 34 percent from the 3 - point line , while the Hawks went 40 percent from the floor and 16 percent from beyond the arc . While the game may have been close , The Utah Jazz ( 30 - 23 ) shot the ball much better than the Atlanta Hawks ( 16 - 35 ) , going 53 percent from the field compared to just 40 percent from the field for the Atlanta Hawks ( 16 - 35 ) . Ricky Rubio scored 22 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 8 - 10 FG ) and handed out 11 assists . Donovan Mitchell had a strong showing as well with 15 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and 5 assists . Joe Ingles went 7 - for - 11 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the 2 - point line to score 19 points in 32 minutes . Atlanta tried to close the gap in the 5 by sending Rudy Gobert to the line as many times as possible , but Rudy Gobert was able make enough free throw attempts to help ice the game . Derrick Favors had a nice showing as well , posting 14 points ( 7 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) , 7 rebounds and 2 blocked shots . Jae Crowder was able to record a double - double of Jae Crowder own , finishing with 12 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 0 - 8 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and 8 rebounds . Trae Young struggled to just 1 points on 1 - of - 5 shooting during Monday 's game against the Timberwolves , so it was good to see Trae Young return to form and have a ton of success on the offensive side of the ball . The only other Hawks to reach double figures in points was Kevin Richards , who finished with 14 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 4 - 8 3Pt ) and 7 assists in 29 minutes . He went off for 21 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) and 7 assists in 28 minutes , while Dewayne Dedmon added 15 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and 7 rebounds in 29 minutes . John Collins also had a solid showing , posting 19 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 5 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 9 FT ) , 9 rebounds and 2 assists . The only other Hawks to reach double figures in points was Kent Bazemore , who came off the bench for 13 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) . Next , the Hawks will head to Phoenix to face Suns on Saturday . The Jazz will stay home to host Rockets on Saturday .

He went off for 21 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 1 - 9 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) and 3 assists in 30 minutes , while Josh Hart added 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and 4 rebounds in 29 minutes . Beverley had possibly the most impressive game , though , as Beverley filled up the stat sheet , scoring 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 5 FT ) to go with 9 rebounds , 5 assists and 5 steals in 36 minutes . From there , there was a big drop off in Los_Angeles production , as Lou Williams scored 21 points on 5 - of - 15 shooting and also recorded 2 rebounds and 2 assists in 30 minutes . The Lakers will look to bounce back when they host Denver Nuggets on Wednesday  while the Los_Angeles Clippers will return home to face the Thunder on Friday .

Tobias Harris also had a solid showing , posting 19 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , 7 rebounds and 2 assists . Marvin Bagley was also productive off the bench , scoring 11 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 FT ) and grabbing 4 rebounds . The 76ers now head to Milwaukee for a Sunday night showdown versus the Bucks  while the Kings will look to bounce back when they take on Chicago Bulls on Sunday .

Minnesota out - shot Brooklyn , converting 48 percent of their field goals compared to the Nets ' 42 percent from the field . Jarrett Allen went 2 - for - 8 from the field and a perfect 2 - for - 2 from the free throw line to score 12 points , while also adding 4 rebounds . Spencer Dinwiddie ( back ) returned from a 2 - game absence , leading the way with 18 points ( 8 - 25 FG , 0 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , 8 assists , 2 rebounds and 0 steal in 30 minutes . In 24 minutes , DeMarre Carroll finished with 13 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , 2 assists and 2 steals . Andrew Wiggins finished with 14 points ( 4 - 14 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt ) in 35 minutes . Karl-Anthony Towns on the other hand shot really well , going 11 - for - 18 from the field to record 21 points , while also adding 9 rebounds . Taj Gibson recorded a double - double with 16 points ( 6 - 6 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and 11 rebounds . Rose went 11 - for - 18 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from behind the arc to finish with 25 points , while also recording 3 rebounds , 3 assists , and a steal . The Nets will look to bounce back when they host Philadelphia 76ers on Sunday  while the Minnesota Timberwolves will return home to face the Bulls on Saturday .

The San_Antonio Spurs went 48 percent from the field and 39 percent from the 3 - point line , while the Pelicans went just 45 percent from the field and 29 percent from deep . Rudy Gay shot 6 - for - 10 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the 3 - point line to score 17 points , while also adding 3 assists . Coming just shy of a double - double , DeMar DeRozan had 10 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 8 FT ) and 6 rebounds . LaMarcus Aldridge went an efficient 12 - for - 20 from the floor to score 25 points , while also grabbing 14 rebounds . Marco Belinelli went 7 - for - 10 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from beyond the arc to score 17 points . Patty Mills chipped in with a solid contribution off the bench , recording 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) and 3 rebounds in 22 minutes . Rookie Frank Jackson came out of nowhere to score a career - high of 25 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) in 42 minutes off the bench that did the majority of the work for the Pelicans . Miller recorded 11 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and 2 rebounds . Fellow superstar ue Holiday shot 7 - for - 16 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the 1 - point line to score 15 points , while also grabbing 4 rebounds and handing out 4 assists . Starting in place of Bradley Beal at shooting guard , Ian Clark had 15 points ( 1 - 9 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 0 - 3 FT ) and 1 rebounds in 14 minutes . The Spurs now head to Sacramento for a Monday night showdown versus the Kings  while the Pelicans will look to bounce back when they take on Indiana Pacers on Monday .
